section.title: Overview
section.p: Hama Apache Hama is a distributed computing framework based on BSP (Bulk Synchronous Parallel) computing techniques for massive scientific computations (e.g., matrix, graph, network, ..., etc), currently being incubated as one of the incubator project by the Apache Software Foundation.
